EmailTemplate.name: 11_11_2014 5.0 Release Announcement.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo 5.0 Has Landed with SDN, VDI, & Hybrid Cloud Control. Win a Phantom 2 Vision+ Drone.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You Make 35,000 Decisions Every Day.
Put the Virtual Ones on Autopilot with VMTurbo 5.0 What if we told you that today's release will allow you to build and control any cloud architecture you want? On-demand bursting to AWS? Check. To Azure? Check.
Latency-slashing VDI control? Yessir. Out-of-the-box dynamic affinity rules? Of course (learn all about vPods here <http://vmturbo.com/35000-decisions/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000decisions&utm_content=111114>). VMTurbo 5.0 features five brand new control modules, each of which grants you unprecedented control over your cloud.
- Network Control Module - Hybrid Cloud Control Module - VDI Control Module - Application Control Module - Container Control Module
JOIN US NOVEMBER 19 FOR THE 5.0 RELEASE WEBINAR <http://vmturbo.com/5_0-release-webinar/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000decisions&utm_content=111114> or JUST LET ME AT THAT DRONE <http://vmturbo.com/35000-decisions/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000decisions&utm_content=111114> Learn About 5.0 <http://vmturbo.com/35000-decisions/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000decisions&utm_content=111114> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
